Summon Commander:#473 Telestic Animate
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The mage crafts a statue and places a golden plate inscribed with divine names within its head. The statue is thus animated by divine power and will speak the will of the Pretender God. The statue is imbued with great priestly powers, but is immobile.
